frozen.name: retroarch
frozen.shortDescription: Multi-platform emulator frontend for libretro cores (with cores: libretro-atari800-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-gba-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-lynx-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-ngp-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-pce-fast-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-pcfx-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-psx-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-psx-hw-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-saturn-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-snes-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-supergrafx-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-vb-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mednafen-wswan-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-blastem-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-bluemsx-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-bsnes-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-bsnes-hd-beta-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-bsnes-mercury-accuracy-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-bsnes-mercury-balanced-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-bsnes-mercury-performance-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-citra-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-citra-canary-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-desmume-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-desmume2015-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-dolphin-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-dosbox-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-81-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-fbalpha2012-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-fbneo-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-fceumm-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-flycast-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-fmsx-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-freeintv-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-gambatte-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-genesis-plus-gx-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-gpsp-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-gw-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-handy-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-hatari-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mame-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mame2000-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-mame2003-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-neocd-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-nestopia-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-np2kai-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-o2em-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-opera-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-parallel-n64-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-pcsx2-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-pcsx_rearmed-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-picodrive-unstable-2022-01-21, libretro-play-unstable-2022-01-21,
